casebody.data:
Tuesday, September 22, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

98-904. State v. Herring.

Mahoning C.P. No. 96CR339. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Mahoning County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for extension of time for transmission of the record,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for extension of time for transmission of the record be, and hereby is, granted, and the time for transmitting the record is extended to September 22, 1998. No further extensions will be granted.
